titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that Congress should reduce spending by the amount resulting from the recently announced earmark moratorium.
A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that Congress should reduce spending by the amount resulting from the recently announced earmark moratorium.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Budget.

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of the Senate that Congress should reduce spending by the amount resulting from the recently announced earmark moratorium.
